headline: Jordan Demands Investigation Into Nancy Pelosi After Disturbing Revelation
author: IWB
sentences:
Ohio Republican Rep. Jim Jordan says the Democrats committee investigating the incident at the U.S. Capitol last January is a “complete assault on Americans’ liberty.”
Jordan said the Dem-led investigation is a “political operation” designed to stop Donald Trump from running for the White House again.
And he wants an investigation into House Speaker Nancy Pelosi over her role surrounding that day.
